price: 你说：“有经典的人啊！安拉是见证你们的行为的，你们为什么不信安拉的迹象呢？”
arabic: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تَكۡفُرُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱللَّهُ شَهِيدٌ عَلَىٰ مَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: qul yāahla al-kitābi lima takfurūna biāyāti al-lahi wal-lahu shahīdun ʿalā mā taʿmalūna
